name: Sussy Monkeys
description:
[CONTROLLER REQUIRED]

You fight to keep your tree intact by extinguishing fires and destroying your neighbor's tree. Use bananas to either throw a banana molotov to the enemy team or to use as fuel for your fire extinguisher.

Controls:

1st Player:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

Hold Left Click - Throw Banana

Right Click - Extinguish Fires

2nd Player:

Left Joystick - Movement

Right Bumper - Throw Banana

X - Extinguish Fires
